Project Categories

Specialized expertise for every industry

Hotels & Hospitality

Guest room electronic locks, property management system integration, common area access control, and master key systems.

Recent Projects:

  • • Monterey Bay Resort - 200 guest rooms
  • • Carmel Valley Inn - Complete renovation
  • • Pacific Grove Hotel - Access upgrade

Educational Facilities

Student dormitory access, classroom security, administrative areas, and campus-wide card systems with student ID integration.

Recent Projects:

  • • CSUMB Student Housing - 500 doors
  • • Hartnell College - Security upgrade
  • • MPC Campus - Access control expansion

Commercial Buildings

Multi-tenant access control, elevator integration, parking access, visitor management, and building automation integration.

Recent Projects:

  • • Salinas Office Complex - Multi-tenant
  • • Santa Cruz Business Park - Phase 2
  • • Hollister Medical Center - Secure areas

Featured Project: Monterey Bay Resort

Complete access control solution for 200-room luxury resort including guest room locks, property management integration, and common area security.

Project Scope:

  • ✓ 200 guest room electronic locks with RFID technology
  • ✓ Property management system integration (Opera PMS)
  • ✓ Common area access control for staff and service areas
  • ✓ Mobile key capability for VIP guests
  • ✓ Master key system for housekeeping and maintenance
  • ✓ 24/7 monitoring and emergency override capability
Discuss Your Project

Our Project Process

From initial consultation to ongoing support

1

Site Assessment

Comprehensive facility review, security assessment, and requirement analysis to understand your specific needs.

2

System Design

Custom system design with detailed specifications, floor plans, and equipment schedules tailored to your facility.

3

Project Management

Coordinated installation with your construction schedule, minimal disruption to operations, and regular progress updates.

4

Training & Support

Complete system training, documentation, and ongoing support to ensure optimal performance for years to come.

Project Capabilities

From small renovations to large-scale new construction

New Construction

  • ✓ Design/build collaboration with architects
  • ✓ Value engineering and cost optimization
  • ✓ Coordinated installation schedule
  • ✓ Code compliance verification

Renovations & Upgrades

  • ✓ Phased installation to minimize disruption
  • ✓ Legacy system integration
  • ✓ Working around occupied spaces
  • ✓ After-hours installation available
